div.p: Last date or last date and time the linked resource was verified. Verification may include link resolution as well as verification of the version of the linked object. Available in citation, relation, source, and term.

Constrained to the following patterns: YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY, or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss [with optional timezone offset from UTC in the form of [+|-][hh:mm], or "Z" to indicate the dateTime is UTC. No timezone implies the dateTime is UTC.]

egXML.ead:control:
[. . .] DACS Describing Archives: a Content Standard
DACS was used as the primary description standard.
[. . .]
